column4: When using a BitTorrent client, all seems well for several hours, then all of a sudden my net access slows to a crawl and I can no longer get to any websites without resetting both my cable modem and my router.  Does this sound like a router being overwhelmed problem or something else?
Do you have this issue on any other internet connected items in your household?
yes, everything slows to a crawl.
Then this rules out your network adapter being the problem. Have you had this issue without your router?
I've never tried hooking the modem up direct before.
You should. If you still have this issue, I advise talking to your ISP about getting a replacement modem.
However if you DON'T have the issue, then we know it's a router issue. Thus you can come back here after that.
or maybe this is an issue with throttling?  Although I've limited the speed of the bittorrent client to something reasonable compared to my connection
It might be, it might not be. Hence why I suggest trying with your modem directly connected.
Also
Encryption settings may work on your torrent program. Comcast for example, cripples speeds if you torrent without encryption.
But that's another discusison :)
scuse my typos

but your symptoms are a tad bit different.
